title: B.S. Report - The Grantland Basketball Hour (Ep. 3)
description: On the audio version of the 'Grantland Basketball Hour,' Ryen Russillo joins Bill and Jalen to break down the Rondo trade, plus Michael Rapaport talks the New York Knicks.
